stimulusHtml: Two long, straight wires are parallel to and equidistant from the y-axis, as shown above left. Each carries current I in opposite directions, resulting in a magnetic field of magnitude B0 at the origin. If the wires are each bent into right angles and placed as shown above right, what is the magnitude of the magnetic field at the origin?
